subject: World Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: North and South Korea are in the World Cup for the first time, but an opportunity to unite people on the war-divided peninsula might have been scuttled when a South Korean warship was sunk in March.
snippet: North and South Korea are in the World Cup for the first time, but an opportunity to unite people on the war-divided peninsula might have been scuttled when a South Korean warship was sunk in March.
